manifest.name: update-browserslist-db
manifest.description: CLI tool to update caniuse-lite to refresh target browsers from Browserslist config
manifest.readme: # Update Browserslist DB CLI tool to update `caniuse-lite` with browsers DB from [Browserslist](https://github.com/browserslist/browserslist/) config. Some queries like `last 2 versions` or `>1%` depend on actual data from `caniuse-lite`. ```sh npx update-browserslist-db@latest ``` ## Docs Read full docs **[here](https://github.com/browserslist/update-db#readme)**.
